meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by cytomegaly.
meanings.sent1: The cytomegalic cells were much larger than normal.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the cytomegalic growth was causing the issue.
meanings.sent3: The cytomegalic pumpkin in the garden was so big, it won first prize!
meanings.sent4: Her cytomegalic smile lit up the room, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The cytomegalic tree towered over the others, casting a long shadow.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affected by cytomegalovirus.
meanings.sent1: The cytomegalic infection spread quickly through the community.
meanings.sent2: She was feeling unwell due to the cytomegalic virus attacking her system.
meanings.sent3: The cytomegalic party guest unknowingly passed on the virus to others.
meanings.sent4: The cytomegalic storm of illness swept through the town, leaving many sick.
meanings.sent5: The cytomegalic cloud of sickness hung over the city, causing concern among residents.
